/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the street, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. The street itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, giving it a serene and peaceful ambiance.
